text: Spain has a few mathematics museums listed below. == Museums == * Museum of Mathematics of Catalonia, in Cornellà * Madrid Mathematical Space, in Leganés * Interactive Museum of Mathematics, in Torrelodones * Museum of Mathematics, in the Polytechnic University of Madrid * Canary Islands Mathematics House, in Gran Canaria and Tenerife * Museum of Mathematics of Aragon, in Huesca == References == Category:Lists
title: List of mathematics museums in Spain
